segments.text: I can see the sunlight streaming through the window, illuminating the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s strange how peaceful it looks outside, compared to this brewing storm indoors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s tiny fingers are just inches away from the cookie jar, defying gravity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can hear the water sloshing as it spills over the edge, and it makes my heart race.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s oblivion is astonishing; she seems like an island in a sea of chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are clearly in on some secret joke, while I’m left out of the loop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will be before the bubble bursts and reality sets in.
segments.speaker: PAR
